title: Asparagus and courgette rice
ingredients: ['1/2 tablespoon butter', '1 onion, chopped', '10 spears fresh asparagus, trimmed and cut into 5cm pieces', '1 courgette, sliced', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon dried basil', '1/4 teaspoon dried thyme', '1/8 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', 'salt and pepper to taste', '475ml water', '185g uncooked long-grain white rice']
